feed.title: SAP Community - NW ABAP Monitoring Tools
feed.subtitle: NW ABAP Monitoring Tools Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Where can i see the output of Background Job containing program which uses Call method for Output.
entry.content:
Hi.

As mentioned in the question my requirement is, that my ABAP Program does not contain any variant instead, it calls for the other programs to get the output. Also, it contains multiple programs which leads to multiple outputs. So if I Run it manually I get the output one after the other.

But I want to schedule this program as a background job. So if I normally schedule the programs as a background job, I can see their output as a spool request.

I have tried scheduling this program as a background job, and it shows that the job is completed. But unlike other background jobs that contain programs with variants, this doesn't show any spool requests generated.

It says the job is complete. So if the job is complete the program output should be stored somewhere in the SAP server. I've checked in SP01 too. It shows the same result. There is no Spool Generated. I just want to know where the outputs of the scheduled background jobs are stored in SAP even when there are no variants used and the program itself can get its own output using the call method. Can someone please help me with this? I have been looking out for almost a week now. üòû

Thanks in Advance.
I really Appreciate it.

entry.title: Is there a way to extract the list of tcodes in profile SAP_ALL or IDES_DEVELOP?
entry.content:
Hi.

Is there any way to extract the list of tcodes these profiles contain? If yes can anyone tell me how do i do that?

Thanks, Folks.

entry.title: Is there a way to capture snapshots of SM51 by writing an SAP Script for it?
entry.content:
Hi.

Is it possible to write an SAP Script that captures Snapshot of SM51 (Running Application) and schedule that to run every 30 minutes? If yes, how I make it work?

Thanks,
Appreciate the help. üôÇ

entry.title: Is there a way to restrict user login for specific period and implement on the weekly basis?
entry.content:
Hi..

I want to restrict user login for 1 or 2 days a week and implement this on a weekly basis. So, is there a way to do this? If yes how?

Thanks in Advance. üôÇ

entry.title: User Defined Search in SAP ABAP Monitoring: SXMB_MONI for Synch messages
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
I am trying to setup a used defined search criteria for synch message in S4 side. But, it is not working when executed from SXMB_MONI and working only when tested in the test search criteria.
Here are some links for this configuration -

https://lessonslearnedsap.wordpress.com/2017/07/28/user-defined-selection-criteria-on-abap-stack-in-sxi_monitor/

https://help.sap.com/doc/saphelp_nw73ehp1/7.31.19/en-us/48/c85598f63335bfe10000000a42189d/content.htm?no_cache=true

Thanks

Sugata

entry.title: How to append an existing custom structure to a standard table
entry.content:
Hi,

I created a custom structure and I need to add it in append inside a standard table.

but if I click the "Append structure" button it tells me that the structure already exists:

I don't want to create the structure, because it already exists, but I just need to add it to the standard table. How can I do that?

 

thank you

entry.title: how to read fields of structures
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

inside a custom report, I need to read some fields that are present in these structures:

 

AFVGD
AFRUD
CAUFVD
VIQMFE
RIWO00
VIQMUR

 

since they are structures, I can't do a Select, are there tables that I can use that are connected to these structures? Or are there Function Modules?


Thank you!

entry.title: Get the data from RFC BAPI Result
entry.content:
Hi Everyone

The third-party application is sending data to SAP Standard RFC BAPI parameter, then the BAPI will prepare a data then extract it / send it to third party application

My question is how to view the RFC BAPI received data and sent to third party application without any code modification? is there a log history of data received/sent in SAP or tcode I can use to view the received/sent data?


Like for example: these BAPI parameters was sent to third party application yesterday after a week I want to review/check the data sent to third party application

entry.title: SAP XI/PI excel to custom RFC
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

in my old custom RFC there are 3 import parameters ( IV_NAME, IV_AGE, IV_ADDRESS )

Existing

FieldIV_NAMEIV_AgeIV_Address
ValueNAME118Canada

need to add

FieldIV_CITY
ValueCITY1

in the XI/PO mapping the parameter is ( IV_NAME, IV_AGE, IV_ADDRESS )

In the new requirement we need to add and get the City from file created from XI/PO, I already adjusted the custom RFC and added the IV_CITY and the XI/PO team also added the new parameter IV_CITY to the mapping. while doing debugging, I checked the import parameter in the RFC and saw that the RFC did not receive the City value, what could be the cause of the issue?

entry.title: How to determine the RFC type
entry.content: Hello, how to determine the RFC type currently used in the system if it is Asynchronous, Synchronous, etc. Which tcode should i check?

entry.title: Passing data from one session to another session
entry.content:
Hi,

I need to pass data from one LUW to another in my SAP system. Initially, I tried using Memory ID, but I encountered issues when multiple sessions attempted to update the same Memory ID simultaneously.

In my system, Shared Memory is not allowed, so I am exploring other options. I am considering using a persistence mechanism, but I don‚Äôt want to create a custom Z table to store the data.

Is there a way to achieve this using standard SAP features, such as persistent objects, temporary cluster tables, or any other alternatives?

Thanks in advance for your suggestions!

entry.title: Question: Is ABAP performance tracing (ST12) still a topic?
entry.content:
Hi,
 
more than 10 years ago i wrote a couple of blogs on ABAP
performance tracing with ST12 (see below). 

The performance tools in ADT and the tools for SAP GUI
in  the SAP standard (STATS, SAT, ST05 and SCI) are
always available and particularly good in their specific areas.
But for me,  ST12 was (and in 2025 still is) like a
Swiss army knife when it comes to ABAP performance tracing.
I like to use it as a first tool and revert to the other tools when
necessary.

In the last 10+ years i haven't been active on here since
i worked on other topics. Now I'm back and work on ABAP (and
CDS and HANA) topics again. I looked a little bit around here and
still remember some names that i have seen more than 10 years ago.

I wonder if ABAP performance tracing is sill a topic or are
ABAP performance problems = solved problems? Would
you be interested in an update on ST12 or is this an outdated
topic and not relevant to you anymore?

Kind regards,

Hermann
 
 
Single Transaction Analysis (ST12) ‚Äì getting start... - SAP Community
ST12 - The workprocess trace - SAP Community
ST12 - storing additional information and managing... - SAP Community
ST12 ‚Äì tracing user requests (Tasks & HTTP) - SAP Community
ST12 - tracing a single dialog step - SAP Community
ST12 - tracing function modules - SAP Community
ST12 ‚Äì Who calls whom (get the call stack with bot... - SAP Community
ST12 - new features - SAP Community
ST12 - 01N_* SP1 new features - SAP Community
ST12 - Schedule Traces - SAP Community

entry.title: Automatically export / save update errors and short dumps
entry.content:
Hi,

As auditors keep an eye on missing document numbers, we have to explain these.

We found out they often come from update errors in SM13 (with corresponding short dumps in ST22).

For documentation and analysis we need to be able to access these historically.
As short dumps are reorganized regularly and update errors should be deleted before updates we need another solution.

Is there a way to automatically export update errors and (corresponding) short dumps?

Thank you for feedback & Best regards,

Jonas

entry.content: While editing the BADI getting this issue. How to solve it
